projectMain.title: WFind!t
projectMain.description: (in-progress) A waterloo campus web based application that helps students find their lost items on the campus

projectMain.title: IamCold
projectMain.description: A campus navigation app, which helps students to go to their classes through indoor tunnels and bridges.

projectMain.title: Openbrowser
projectMain.description: A full-stack project that uses decentralized storage and block chain to transfer and store images privately

projectMain.title: Unitfication
projectMain.description: A chrome extension that automatically converts all sites from American or Imperial units to SI metric and vice versa

projectSub.title: Openbrowser
projectSub.description: A full-stack project that uses decentralized storage and block chain to transfer and store images privately

projectSub.title: Personal Website V2
projectSub.description: Version 2 of the personal website, showcasing portfolio projects, skills, and experience.

projectSub.title: Openbrowser Frontend
projectSub.description: Frontend implementation for the Openbrowser project, a decentralized storage and block chain-based platform for transferring and storing images privately.

projectSub.title: RusticChess Client
projectSub.description: Client frontend for RusticChess, a full-stack chess game with a Rust server backend and TypeScript frontend. Offers an intuitive and user-friendly interface.

projectSub.title: RusticChess Server
projectSub.description: Server backend for RusticChess, a full-stack chess game with a Rust server backend and TypeScript frontend. Handles game logic and player connections.

projectSub.title: MedSpacy
projectSub.description: Fork of MedSpacy, a library for clinical NLP with spaCy.

projectSub.title: Rust Algorithms
projectSub.description: Fork of TheAlgorithms/Rust, a collection of algorithms implemented in the Rust programming language.

projectSub.title: Openbrowser Frontend Prototype
projectSub.description: Prototype version of the Openbrowser project frontend.

projectSub.title: Neu-Calculator
projectSub.description: A web-based calculator with a neumorphism-inspired user interface. Perform basic arithmetic operations in style.

projectSub.title: Quad-Tree Image Compression
projectSub.description: An image compression algorithm based on the quad-tree data structure.

projectSub.title: Polybets UI
projectSub.description: User interface for the Polybets project.

projectSub.title: app.lp.finance
projectSub.description: Financial application built using modern web technologies.

projectSub.title: Leetcode Solutions
projectSub.description: A collection of Leetcode solutions, aiming to solve at least one problem per day.

projectSub.title: Scroll Stopper
projectSub.description: A browser extension that stops scrolling, created to learn how browser extensions work.

projectSub.title: Baekjoon Online Judge Solutions
projectSub.description: A repository containing solutions to problems from the Baekjoon Online Judge platform.

projectSub.title: Magic 8-Ball
projectSub.description: A web-based version of the classic Magic 8-Ball toy, providing random answers to user questions.
